name: Fig's House
description:
MANUAL (DO NOT SKIP ANY STETPS!)

1. Find hammer inside one of the closets

2. Break a cracked wall with the hammer

3. Find the key that was dropped randomly somewhere in the house

4. Open the chest behind the wall that you broke in step 2 to get a keycard

5. Find and open a door that you can open with keycard

6.  Pick up a green exit key

7. Find and open the exit door

YOU WON!
